key.uiDescription:
Gather energy from your surroundings to form and launch an orb in front of you to deal damage.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font>
Deals <font color='#00aaef'>38%</font> damage.
Hold down the skill key to attack repeatedly. Deals <font color='#00aaef'>170%</font> damage on the third hit.

Gather energy from your surroundings to form and launch an orb in front of you to deal damage.
